00002 %! @mainpage CentralSlice
00003 % CT Image Reconstruction using Central Slice Theorem
00004 % 
00005 % Refer to the project homepage http://code.google.com/p/centralslice/
00006 
00007 %! @file
00008 % Main process of the simulation.
00009 
00010 %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
00011 %! Main process of the simulation.
00012 % This script generates a radon projection image from a selected phantom.
00013 % Then 1D Fourier transform is applied to each projection angle. The result is then interpolated onto the cartesian plane according to Central slice theorem. Lastly inverse 2D Fourier transform is applied to reproduce the image.
00014 % @param shape shape of the phantom
00015 % @param N mininium size of the phantom image (in pixels)
00016 % @param SNR Signal to Noise Ratio
00017 % @param DEBUG mode. If set to 1, many more figures are printed out for debugging process.
00018 function main(shape,N,SNR,DEBUG)
00019 %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
00020 %% MAKE A PHANTOM AND APPLY RADON TRANSFROMATION
00021 
00022 Phantom = make_phantom(shape,floor(N/sqrt(2))); % Make a phantom.
00023 
00024 axis_xy = linspace(-N/2,N/2,N);
00025 save_image(axis_xy,axis_xy,Phantom,...
00026         'Phantom','x','y');             % Save the phantom image
00027 
00028 % Angles for Radon Projection.
00029 % It should be from 0deg to 180deg. The last angular sample normally is  smaller than 180deg.
00030 THETA = linspace(0,180-1/1,180*1);
00031 
00032 Radon = radon(Phantom,THETA);           % Apply Radon transform.
00033 
00034 Radon = add_noise(Radon,SNR);           % Add noise to the image
00035 
00036 %% Zeropadding: expand the matrix to power of 2 before doing FFT
00037 [Radon2 axis_s] = zeropad(Radon);
00038 
00039 save_image(THETA,axis_s,Radon2,...
00040         'Radon Projection','theta','s');        % Save the radon image
00041 
00042 %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
00043 %% 1D FOURIER TRANSFORM
00044 [Fourier_Radon axis_omega_s] = apply_fft1(Radon2,DEBUG);
00045 
00046 save_image(THETA, axis_omega_s, abs(Fourier_Radon),...
00047         'Fourier transform of Radon Space, Absolute Value',...
00048         'theta','omega_s');
00049 
00050 %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
00051
